Posts.Content: Hi I had a left mastectomy and reconstruction done nearly 4 weeks ago.  I didn't fit in any bras I brought for after the surgery as the swellings so big I had to order crop tops to wear as I have a enormous left boob and the other is a E cup I know I will be wearing these for a while. They are so comfortable.  I haven't padded out the other boob to match yet but I know I will at some point but for now I need to concentrate on recovering from the surgery.
Posts.Title: Reconstruction and natural boob bra query

Posts.Content: Hi I'm post surgery 6 days I had a left mastectomy and reconstruction  I'm giving u this advise because I'm going through it right now  I'm a 38E in bra size u was staying the same size so I went and got some sports bra non of them will fit as everything is swellen up I brought some in bigger sizes and they still don't fit I had to get a friend to buy me a crop top she got this from sports direct as it comes in dress sizes it was easier to buy  Now I'm home I'm ordering more as the crop tops will be better and works out cheaper in the run as the swelling will go down slowly my crop tops should still fit.
Posts.Title: Post surgery sports bras

Posts.Content: Hi  The nurse helped me out with the crop top actully they pretty much dress me. Because of the size I had to have a crop top on for extra support, I didn't think I was going to swell up so much. My doctor thinks they migh need to do a bit liposuction on the boob after. Thane shirt dress tips and nightie in with u  Wear leggings to go home in in case u have any drains in
